snippet: At the trial to select the U.S. open team for the World Mind Sports Games in August, the 120-board quarterfinals were played on Tuesday and Wednesday.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played in the trial to select the United States open team for the World Mind Sports Games.
lead_paragraph: At the trial to select the U.S. open team for the World Mind Sports Games in August, the 120-board quarterfinals were played on Tuesday and Wednesday.

headline.seo: Bridge — World Mind Sports Games Quarterfinals
